oracleReaderQuery.value:
select * from
(select *
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_order
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd') > @{activity('Get Last Load Date').output.firstRow.max_idr_load_date} 
and material_num in (select material_num from clxbw.apo_bw_d_material where division_name like '%Litter%')
and billto_customer_code in (select customer_code from clxbw.apo_bw_d_customer where customer_name_1 like '%WAL-MART%')
union
select *
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_order
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd')  > @{activity('Get Last Load Date').output.firstRow.max_idr_load_date}
and material_num in (select material_num from clxbw.apo_bw_d_material where division_name like '%Litter%')
and payer_customer_code in (select customer_code from clxbw.apo_bw_d_customer where customer_name_1 like '%DOLLAR GENERAL CORP%')
union
select *
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_order
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd') > @{activity('Get Last Load Date').output.firstRow.max_idr_load_date}
and material_num in (select material_num from clxbw.apo_bw_d_material where division_name like '%Litter%')
and payer_customer_code in (select customer_code from clxbw.apo_bw_d_customer where customer_name_1 like '%KROGER%'))

parameters.Subject: ADF pipeline Load IDR Orders finished successfully

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), max(idr_load_date), 112)  as max_idr_load_date from base_litter_orders

oracleReaderQuery.value:
select * from
(select *
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_billing
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd') > @{activity('Get Last Load Date').output.firstRow.max_idr_load_date} 
and material_num in (select material_num from clxbw.apo_bw_d_material where division_name like '%Litter%')
and billto_customer_code in (select customer_code from clxbw.apo_bw_d_customer where customer_name_1 like '%WAL-MART%')
union
select *
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_billing
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd')  > @{activity('Get Last Load Date').output.firstRow.max_idr_load_date}
and material_num in (select material_num from clxbw.apo_bw_d_material where division_name like '%Litter%')
and payer_customer_code in (select customer_code from clxbw.apo_bw_d_customer where customer_name_1 like '%DOLLAR GENERAL CORP%')
union
select *
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_billing
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd') > @{activity('Get Last Load Date').output.firstRow.max_idr_load_date}
and material_num in (select material_num from clxbw.apo_bw_d_material where division_name like '%Litter%')
and payer_customer_code in (select customer_code from clxbw.apo_bw_d_customer where customer_name_1 like '%KROGER%'))

parameters.Subject: ADF pipeline Load IDR Litter Shipments finished successfully

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), max(idr_load_date), 112)  as max_idr_load_date from base_litter_shipments

properties.description: Reusable pipeline to send email notification on activity failure

activities.name: Send email on failure
activities.description: Reusable pipeline to send email on activity failure

body.value:
{"EmailTo":"@{pipeline().parameters.EmailTo}",
"Subject":"An error has occured in the ADF pipeline",
"DataFactoryName":"@{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
"PipelineName":"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
"Activity":"@{pipeline().parameters.Activity}",
"ErrorMessage":"@{pipeline().parameters.ErrorMessage}" }

Subject.defaultValue: ADF pipeline Load IDR Orders finished successfully
